alert.note: Alert for Clark; Day (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:28PM MDT until August 10 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Day County in northeastern South Dakota... North central Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Pierpont to near Crocker, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Roslyn around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Holmquist, Webster, Antelope Lake, Grenville, Minnewasta Lake, Waubay Lake and Rush Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
